whatIs.title: What is Rune Translator
whatIs.description: Rune Translator is your magical gateway to the world of runes, where decoding ancient scripts is as fun as a quest in your favorite RPG! Connect with fellow adventurers in our vibrant community, share your mystical translations, and dive into game lore like never before. With epic soundtracks and dazzling visuals, it's free and super easy to use. Ready for a cosplay challenge? Let the rune adventures begin!
whatIs.imageAlt: What is rune-translator - Adventurers exploring rune portal

examples.title: Amazing Rune Translation Showcase
examples.description: Step into the mystical world of runes with stunning visual effects and enchanting sound effects! Interact with our community, explore mysterious languages from game IPs, and bring magic to your cosplay and gaming conversations. Free to use, easy to translate, and packed with fun!

howto.title: How to Translate Text to Runes
howto.description: Follow these simple steps to translate your text into ancient runes using our visual guide.
howto.imageAlt: How to translate text to runes - Step by step visual guide

steps.name: Enter Your Text
steps.description: Type or paste your desired text into the input field at the top of the page. You can also click the upload button to import .txt or .docx files, or use the microphone icon for voice input. The input box supports multiple languages and automatically detects the source language.

steps.name: Select Rune Type
steps.description: Choose your preferred rune alphabet from the dropdown menu below the input box. Options include Elder Futhark, Anglo-Saxon runes, and other historical variants. Each selection provides authentic historical accuracy.

steps.name: Click Translate
steps.description: Press the blue Translate button to process your text. The translation appears instantly in the output box below, with both the rune symbols and phonetic pronunciation guide for accuracy.

steps.name: Save or Share
steps.description: Use the download icon to save your translation as a .txt file, click the copy button to clipboard, or share directly to social media. Your results are saved in history for easy access.

items.title: Magical Origins
items.description: Did you know? According to Norse mythology, runes were discovered by the god Odin after he hung himself from Yggdrasil, the World Tree, for nine nights. This divine origin story gives runes mystical significance that continues to captivate modern enthusiasts!

items.title: Viking Communication
items.description: Runes were more than just mystical symbols - they were the practical writing system of Vikings! Used for everything from marking ownership on tools to recording laws and telling epic stories. Imagine a Viking carving a love message on a rune stone - that's ancient romance right there!

items.title: Convention Ready
items.description: Stand out at the next comic con with authentic rune-translated accessories! Perfect for fantasy costumes, LARP events, and themed gatherings. Your fellow nerds will be totally impressed by your attention to linguistic detail!

items.title: Game Night Enhanced
items.description: Level up your tabletop RPG sessions with rune-inscribed props and character backgrounds. D&D dungeons, Pathfinder quests, or homebrew adventures - every game becomes more epic when ancient languages are part of the story!
items.imageAlt: Friends playing tabletop games with runes

items.title: Creative Collaboration
items.description: Join our vibrant community of rune enthusiasts! Share your translations, get feedback on projects, and collaborate with artists, writers, and game developers who love historical languages as much as you do!

items.title: Content Creator's Dream
items.description: Transform your streams, videos, and social media with unique rune aesthetics. Perfect for fantasy gaming channels, educational content about history, or creative projects that need that extra touch of ancient mystery!
items.imageAlt: Digital artist crafting rune inspired visuals

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Have other questions? Feel free to contact us via email.

item-1.question: What is the best free rune translator?
item-1.answer: Our rune translator is the best choice for free rune translations. It's web-based, easy to use, and provides high-quality results without any cost.

item-2.question: Is this rune translator really free?
item-2.answer: Yes, this rune translator is completely free to use! All translation features are available at no cost, ensuring everyone can enjoy the magic of ancient runes.

item-3.question: How is my privacy protected?
item-3.answer: We take your privacy seriously and use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. All translations are processed securely and never stored without your consent. We do not share your information with third parties.

item-4.question: What type of runes are supported?
item-4.answer: Our translator primarily supports Elder Futhark runes, the oldest known runic alphabet used by Germanic tribes. We're constantly working to add more rune types for diverse translation needs.

item-5.question: Can I use these rune translations for commercial projects?
item-5.answer: Absolutely! You can use our rune translations for commercial purposes including game development, art projects, educational materials, and cosplay props. No attribution is required.

item-6.question: How accurate are rune translations?
item-6.answer: Our rune translator provides historically accurate translations based on extensive research of ancient runic alphabets. While we strive for authenticity, please note that some interpretation is involved as runes were used differently across various time periods and regions.

item-7.question: Can developers integrate this rune translator into custom apps?
item-7.answer: Yes. You can plug our rune translator into custom apps or game tools using the public API. It accepts JSON requests, responds in milliseconds, and keeps your player data private with end-to-end encryption.

item-8.question: Can I save my translations?
item-8.answer: You can save your rune translations using the download feature to export them as text files, copy them to clipboard, or share them directly to social media platforms. We do not store any of your translation data on our servers.
